title: WG-22 – Regulatory Energy & Climate - EIGA : European Industrial Gases Association
author: unknown
text: WG-22 – Regulatory Energy & Climate WG-22 objective is to monitor, prioritise, anticipate and react in a timely fashion to legislative proposals on energy and climate files. Specific topics include: CBAM ETD ETS RED Gas-specific files (eg. on hydrogen, on CO2)
